title: WTB: T206 Shaw, Chappie Charles, Rhodes
author: cwazzy

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Shaw, Chappie Charles, Rhodes
posts.post_content:
I need these 3 cards to finish out my T206 Cardinal set.  Please let me know if you have an SGC (preferred) or PSA 3-4 of these cards.  Any back is fine but I still need a Tolstoi, Cycle, and Broadleaf backs for my collection.  Please let me know if you can help me out.  Card must have good eye appeal and centering.  Thanks!

Chris
